Body:
logger.info(f'{request._pyfuncitem.name}()')
value = uuconvert_template_to_string_format(template, default_start='{{',
    default_end='}}')
pytest.assume(exp_value == value)
pytest.mark.parametrize('template, exp_value', [(
    'ping {{app.inner_host_name}}', 'ping {app_inner_host_name}'), (
    'Hi, {{user}}. My name is {{app.first.name}}. Good Luck!',
    'Hi, {user}. My name is {app_first_name}. Good Luck!'), ('plain text',
    'plain text'), ('First. Second.', 'First. Second.'), ('{{name}}',
    '{name}'), ('{{app,name}}', '{app,name}'), ('{{name}}.', '{name}.'), (
    '{{app,name}}.', '{app,name}.'), ('', ''), (None, None)])
